revised_title: The Evolution of Voltaire's Mention of Newton's Apple Story
tldr: This article examines the various references to the story of Newton's apple by Voltaire, tracing its evolution from its first mention in 1727 to its appearance in later works. The authors also discuss the authenticity of the story and provide details about the preservation of a piece of the apple tree.
